SEARCH
Package Data.DataAccess

Class ScheduleDAO

java.lang.Object
Data.DataAccess.ScheduleDAO
public class ScheduleDAO extends Object
The ScheduleDAO class handles the data access for doctor schedules. This includes loading, saving, adding, deleting, and updating schedules from a CSV file.

    • fetch

      public List<Schedule> fetch()
      Fetches all schedules from the CSV file.
      Returns:
      A list of schedules.

    • add

      public void add(Schedule schedule)
      Adds a new schedule or updates an existing schedule for a doctor.
      Parameters:
      schedule - The schedule to be added or updated.

    • deleteDate

      public void deleteDate(String doctorId, LocalDate date)
      Deletes a specific date from a doctor's schedule.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The doctor's ID.
      date - The date to be deleted from the schedule.

    • updateIsAvailable

      public void updateIsAvailable(String doctorId, LocalDate date, Boolean isAvailable, String time)
      Updates the availability status and time for a specific date in a doctor's schedule.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The doctor's ID.
      date - The date to be updated.
      isAvailable - The updated availability status.
      time - The updated time.

    • find

      public Schedule find(String doctorId)
      Finds a schedule for a specific doctor by their ID.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The doctor's ID.
      Returns:
      The schedule of the doctor if found, or null if not found.
